alert.note: Alert for Jackson (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 10 at 7:50PM CST until March 11 at 1:12PM CST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Illinois... Big Muddy River near Murphysboro. .The Big Muddy River will continue a slow fall, going below flood stage at Murphysboro tomorrow morning. For the Big Muddy River...including Murphysboro...Minor flooding is forecast. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Big Muddy River near Murphysboro. * WHEN...Until early tomorrow afternoon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 PM CST Friday the stage was 23.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 22.0 feet. &&
